ORIGIN_TYPES.name: saiyan
ORIGIN_TYPES.description: A race of space barbarians with the power to transform into Great Apes.

ORIGIN_TYPES.name: halfSaiyan
ORIGIN_TYPES.description: The result of a human and a saiyan, boasting many of the same strengths as a saiyan but with less interest in battle.

ORIGIN_TYPES.name: earthling
ORIGIN_TYPES.description: Humans capable of harnessing Ki. Technology(item)

ORIGIN_TYPES.name: namekian
ORIGIN_TYPES.description: Humanoids with plant and slug-like characteristics, including green skin and antennae. Regeneration

ARCHETYPE_TYPES.name: warrior
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.description: Warrior is an archetype with a focus on energy attacks.
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.extraDescription: Warriors have honed their abilities on the battlefield. They have a skills and abilities that aid their domination of the opposition.

ARCHETYPE_TYPES.name: striker
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.description: Striker is an archetype with a focus on physical attacks.
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.extraDescription: Strikers are trained by masters of their fighting style, Their techniques are practiced in tournaments and honored duels.

ARCHETYPE_TYPES.name: tank
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.description: Tank is an archetype with a focus on absorbing damage and protection.
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.extraDescription: A Tanks resilience are a testament to their will-power, they can with stand because they have with stood.

ARCHETYPE_TYPES.name: support
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.description: Support is an archetype with a focus on boosting team members and distraction.
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.extraDescription: Delaying the inevitable and raising morale, Supports are the key to controlling the fight.

FORM_TYPES.name: greatApe
FORM_TYPES.description: Great Ape is a full form transformation, When a Saiyan or half Saiyan looks at a full moon, whilst having a tail. They turn into a gigantic ape and lose control.
FORM_TYPES.extraDescription: Great Apes's are gigantic, covered in brown fur and a long tail. Anything other than Saiyan Armor is destroyed during transformation.

FORM_TYPES.name: superSaiyan
FORM_TYPES.description: Super Saiyan is an alteration transformation, accessible at sparking level 6 or higher. A Super Saiyan has increased power and ki. Costs 1 Sparking per turn.
FORM_TYPES.extraDescription: A Super Saiyan's hair stands on end and becomes a golden yellow, pulsing energy surrounds them.

FORM_TYPES.name: potentialUnlocked
FORM_TYPES.description: Potential Unlocked is an aura transformation, increasing agility and spirit. Accessible at sparking level 4.
FORM_TYPES.extraDescription: When ones potential is unlocked, they feel power deep within them rise to the surface. Feeling taller and lighter.

FORM_TYPES.name: kaioKen
FORM_TYPES.description: Kaio-Ken is an aura transformation, Increasing agility, power and ki by the current level of Sparking and decreasing toughness and spirit by the current level of Sparking. Costs 1 Sparking per turn.
FORM_TYPES.extraDescription: A technique invented by King Kai. it multiplies the user's ki for a heartbeat and turns their aura crimson - amplifying their power and speed to overcome previously stronger foes at the cost of extreme bodily recoil.
